targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  data_time_stamp AS "time",
  sensor_index,
  primary_id_a,
  secondary_id_a,
  primary_id_b,
  primary_key_b,
  secondary_id_b,
  secondary_key_b
FROM thingspeak_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Station Information And Status Fields: Numbers

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(icon) AS "icon",
  max(location_type) AS "location_type",
  max(private) AS "private",
  max(latitude) AS "latitude",
  max(longitude) AS "longitude",
  max(altitude) AS "altitude",
  max(position_rating) AS "position_rating",
  max(led_brightness) AS "led_brightness",
  max(rssi) AS "rssi",
  max(uptime) AS "uptime",
  max(pa_latency) AS "pa_latency",
  max(memory) AS "memory",
  max(channel_state) AS "channel_state",
  max(channel_flags) AS "channel_flags",
  max(channel_flags_manual) AS "channel_flags_manual",
  max(channel_flags_auto) AS "channel_flags_auto",
  max(confidence) AS "confidence",
  max(confidence_manual) AS "confidence_manual",
  max(confidence_auto) AS "confidence_auto"
FROM station_information_and_status_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Station Information And Status Fields: Numbers

panels.description: Station Information And Status Fields: Text

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  data_time_stamp AS "time",
  name AS "name",
  model AS "model",
  hardware AS "hardware",
  last_seen AS "last_seen",
  last_modified AS "last_modified",
  date_created AS "date_created"
FROM station_information_and_status_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Station Information And Status Fields: Text

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(pm2_5_10minute) AS "pm2_5_10minute",
  max(pm2_5_10minute_a) AS "pm2_5_10minute_a",
  max(pm2_5_10minute_b) AS "pm2_5_10minute_b",
  max(pm2_5_30minute) AS "pm2_5_30minute",
  max(pm2_5_30minute_a) AS "pm2_5_30minute_a",
  max(pm2_5_30minute_b) AS "pm2_5_30minute_b",
  max(pm2_5_60minute) AS "pm2_5_60minute",
  max(pm2_5_60minute_a) AS "pm2_5_60minute_a",
  max(pm2_5_60minute_b) AS "pm2_5_60minute_b",
  max(pm2_5_6hour) AS "pm2_5_6hour",
  max(pm2_5_6hour_a) AS "pm2_5_6hour_a",
  max(pm2_5_6hour_b) AS "pm2_5_6hour_b",
  max(pm2_5_24hour) AS "pm2_5_24hour",
  max(pm2_5_24hour_a) AS "pm2_5_24hour_a",
  max(pm2_5_24hour_b) AS "pm2_5_24hour_b",
  max(pm2_5_1week) AS "pm2_5_1week",
  max(pm2_5_1week_a) AS "pm2_5_1week_a",
  max(pm2_5_1week_b) AS "pm2_5_1week_b"
FROM pm2_5_pseudo_average_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(pm10_0) AS "pm10_0",
  max(pm10_0_a) AS "pm10_0_a",
  max(pm10_0_b) AS "pm10_0_b",
  max(pm10_0_atm) AS "pm10_0_atm",
  max(pm10_0_atm_a) AS "pm10_0_atm_a",
  max(pm10_0_atm_b) AS "pm10_0_atm_b",
  max(pm10_0_cf_1) AS "pm10_0_cf_1",
  max(pm10_0_cf_1_a) AS "pm10_0_cf_1_a",
  max(pm10_0_cf_1_b) AS "pm10_0_cf_1_b"
FROM pm10_0_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(pm2_5_alt) AS "pm2_5_alt",
  max(pm2_5_alt_a) AS "pm2_5_alt_a",
  max(pm2_5_alt_b) AS "pm2_5_alt_b",
  max(pm2_5) AS "pm2_5",
  max(pm2_5_a) AS "pm2_5_a",
  max(pm2_5_b) AS "pm2_5_b",
  max(pm2_5_atm) AS "pm2_5_atm",
  max(pm2_5_atm_a) AS "pm2_5_atm_a",
  max(pm2_5_atm_b) AS "pm2_5_atm_b",
  max(pm2_5_cf_1) AS "pm2_5_cf_1",
  max(pm2_5_cf_1_a) AS "pm2_5_cf_1_a",
  max(pm2_5_cf_1_b) AS "pm2_5_cf_1_b"
FROM pm2_5_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(um_count_0_3) AS "um_count_0_3",
  max(um_count_a_0_3) AS "um_count_a_0_3",
  max(um_count_b_0_3) AS "um_count_b_0_3",
  max(um_count_0_5) AS "um_count_0_5",
  max(um_count_a_0_5) AS "um_count_a_0_5",
  max(um_count_b_0_5) AS "um_count_b_0_5",
  max(um_count_1_0) AS "um_count_1_0",
  max(um_count_a_1_0) AS "um_count_a_1_0",
  max(um_count_b_1_0) AS "um_count_b_1_0",
  max(um_count_2_5) AS "um_count_2_5",
  max(um_count_a_2_5) AS "um_count_a_2_5",
  max(um_count_b_2_5) AS "um_count_b_2_5",
  max(um_count_5_0) AS "um_count_5_0",
  max(um_count_a_5_0) AS "um_count_a_5_0",
  max(um_count_b_5_0) AS "um_count_b_5_0",
  max(um_count_10_0) AS "um_count_10_0",
  max(um_count_a_10_0) AS "um_count_a_10_0",
  max(um_count_b_10_0) AS "um_count_b_10_0"
FROM particle_count_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(pm1_0) AS "pm1_0",
  max(pm1_0_a) AS "pm1_0_a",
  max(pm1_0_b) AS "pm1_0_b",
  max(pm1_0_atm) AS "pm1_0_atm",
  max(pm1_0_atm_a) AS "pm1_0_atm_a",
  max(pm1_0_atm_b) AS "pm1_0_atm_b",
  max(pm1_0_cf_1) AS "pm1_0_cf_1",
  max(pm1_0_cf_1_a) AS "pm1_0_cf_1_a",
  max(pm1_0_cf_1_b) AS "pm1_0_cf_1_b"
FROM pm1_0_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(voc) AS "voc",
  max(voc_a) AS "voc_a",
  max(voc_b) AS "voc_b",
  max(ozone1) AS "ozone1",
  max(analog_input) AS "analog_input"
FROM miscellaneous_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(data_time_stamp,$__interval),
  max(humidity) AS "humidity",
  max(humidity_a) AS "humidity_a",
  max(humidity_b) AS "humidity_b",
  max(pressure) AS "pressure",
  max(pressure_a) AS "pressure_a",
  max(pressure_b) AS "pressure_b"
FROM environmental_fields
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(data_time_stamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
